snippet: Her publisher described the new work as a “compulsively readable crime novel.”
abstract: Second novel called The Silkworm written by J K Rowling, but released under pseudonym Robert Galbraith, is set for release on June 24.
lead_paragraph: Her publisher described the new work as a “compulsively readable crime novel.”

headline.main: New Novel by Rowling, Using Pseudonym, to Be Published in June
headline.print_headline: Rowling’s Alter Ego Has 2nd Novel Coming
